function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction projects involving large teams of contractors and subcontractors may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Impact":"Potential outbreak among construction workers, leading to project delays and health risks for workers and the wider community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, including regular testing, temperature checks, and social distancing measures. Provide necessary personal protective equipment (PPE) and enforce hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Use contact tracing apps and wearable devices to monitor and track workers' movements and interactions. Utilize virtual design and construction (VDC) technologies to minimize the need for physical site visits.","People":"Construction workers, project managers, designers, local communities.","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, government authorities."}]}
